cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao

Class ParticipantManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao.DAOThreadSafe
      • cz.cvut.fel.dbs.smartorchestra.model.dao.ParticipantManager

  • public class ParticipantManager
extends DAOThreadSafe
    This is class to access Participants entities in the database. This class can be use in multiple threads.
    Author:
    Matěj Bartoň (bartom47@fel.cvut.cz)

      • processNewInvitation

        public void processNewInvitation(Sections section,
                                 Events event,
                                 boolean addInvitation)
        Creates/deletes new relation between Players entities in Sections entity given and the given event
        Parameters:
        section - - a Sections entity
        event - - an Events entity
        addInvitation - - a boolean flag, if true the relation is created/updated, otherwise the relation is removed
